After Sales+Technical Assistance+Technic.EXPLANATION: Total number of requests for roadside assistance services received within a specified period, reflecting the demand for the service.
After Sales+Technical Assistance+Technic.FORMULA: Total Number of Roadside Assistance Requests

After Sales+Technical Assistance+Technic.KPIS: Response time to roadside assistance requests.
After Sales+Technical Assistance+Technic.EXPLANATION: Average time taken to respond to roadside assistance requests from the moment the request is received until help arrives.
After Sales+Technical Assistance+Technic.FORMULA: Average Time from Roadside Assistance Request to Response

After Sales+Technical Assistance+Technic.EXPLANATION: Measure of customer satisfaction with the timeliness, effectiveness, and overall quality of roadside assistance services, gathered through post-service surveys.
After Sales+Technical Assistance+Technic.FORMULA: Average Satisfaction Score from Customers Regarding Roadside Assistance

After Sales+Technical Assistance+Technic.EXPLANATION: Average cost incurred for each roadside assistance incident, including labor, equipment, and administrative expenses.
After Sales+Technical Assistance+Technic.FORMULA: Total Cost of Roadside Assistance / Total Number of Incidents

After Sales+Technical Assistance+Technic.EXPLANATION: Percentage of roadside assistance requests that are successfully completed compared to the total number of requests received.
After Sales+Technical Assistance+Technic.FORMULA: (Number of Completed Assistance Requests / Total Number of Assistance Requests) * 100

After Sales+Technical Assistance+Technic.KPIS: ROI (Return on Investment) from roadside assistance.
After Sales+Technical Assistance+Technic.EXPLANATION: Financial return achieved from providing roadside assistance services compared to the costs incurred, calculated as the ratio of benefits to expenses.
After Sales+Technical Assistance+Technic.FORMULA: (Net Benefits from Roadside Assistance / Total Cost of Roadside Assistance) * 100

After Sales+Technical Assistance+Technic.EXPLANATION: Percentage of roadside assistance incidents that are resolved satisfactorily compared to the total number of incidents.
After Sales+Technical Assistance+Technic.FORMULA: (Number of Resolved Incidents / Total Number of Incidents) * 100

After Sales+Technical Assistance+Technic.KPIS: Compliance with roadside assistance service standards.
After Sales+Technical Assistance+Technic.EXPLANATION: Degree to which roadside assistance services meet established service standards and quality expectations, measured through audits and performance evaluations.
After Sales+Technical Assistance+Technic.FORMULA: (Number of Assistance Requests Complying with Standards / Total Number of Assistance Requests) * 100
